title: Self-Awareness
action_items: Keep a daily journal for 1 week
Take a personality test (e.g., MBTI or Enneagram)
Ask 3 close friends about your strengths

title: Set Clear Goals
action_items: Set a reminder to review goals weekly

title: Learn & Improve
action_items: Follow 2 motivational YouTube channels or podcasts
Take a free online course (e.g., Coursera, Khan Academy)

title: Practice Discipline
action_items: Wake up and sleep at the same time daily

title: Reflect & Adjust
action_items: Do a weekly reflection every Sunday
